page.title: 13 THE ROEBANK ARCADE
page.content:
The Roebank Arcade is a covered block of shops on the Bransholme Estate in Hull. At first they were the only shops on the estate, but now there is a large shopping centre one kilometre away.
A survey of people using the arcade was made on a Tuesday morning and a Friday afternoon.
The newsagent had the busiest shop at both times. The baker was busier on Tuesday morning, but most other shops were busier on Friday afternoon, particularily the estate office where rents are paid, and the greengrocer. Almost all the c ustomers lived nearby, and many older people used the arcade because it was nearer their homes.
